version=5.14.4openmpi
language=C
compiler_env=VT_NVCC
compiler_flags_env=VT_NVCFLAGS
compiler=
compiler_flags=-Xcompiler -D_THREAD_SAFE
linker_flags=-Xlinker -Wl,-force_flat_namespace
libs=-Xlinker -lopen-trace-format,-lz,-ldl
preprocessor=/usr/bin/clang -E
preprocessor_flags= -I${includedir}/..
includedir=${includedir}
libdir=${libdir}
vtlib=-Xlinker -lvt
vtmpilib=-Xlinker -lvt-mpi,-lvt-mpi-unify,-lotfaux,-lstdc++,-lmpi
vtmtlib=-Xlinker -lvt-mt
vthyblib=-Xlinker -lvt-hyb,-lvt-mpi-unify,-lotfaux,-lstdc++,-lmpi
vtpomplib=
vtdynattlib=
opari_bin=
opari_opts=
opari_tab_compiler=
opari_tab_compiler_flags=
compinst_compiler_flags=
dyninst_compiler_flags=
tauinst_bin=
tauinst_opts=
tauinst_parse_bin=
tauinst_parse_opts=
inst_avail=manual
inst_default=manual
partype_default=seq
